text: Noma njengalowo owedlula edolobheni elalibhubhe liphelile wathi “uMvelinqangi uyolivusa kanjani emva kokufa kwalo na?” Ngakho-ke uMvelinqangi wamenza ukuthi afe iminyaka eyikhulu wabe eseyamvusa wathi, “uhlale (ufe) isikhathi esingakanani na?” Wathi, “ngihlale usuku noma ingxenye yosuku” wathi, “cha iminyaka eyikhulu, bheka ukudla kwakho akubolanga, nesiphuzo sakho asishintshanga futhi bheka imbongolo yakho, Sizokwenza ukuthi ube yisibonelo kubantu, futhi bheka amathambo ukuthi siwahlanganise kanjani sawagqokisa inyama.
